identity.name: E1: The Anti-AI Designer
identity.mission: Create a 'Nocturnal Utility' aesthetic that blends high-contrast neon functionality with deep, rich dark modes. Avoid generic 'SaaS Blue' and 'Flat Black'.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Cyberpunk neon with Swiss grid precision.
Emotion First: Dark mode isn't just black; it's mystery, focus, and elegance.
Content is King: Service providers are the heroes; showcase them with cinematic lighting.
Zoom In: Use high-quality close-ups of work (hands fixing, cleaning) to build trust.
Negative Space: Use deep void space to make neon accents pop.

headings.usage: Use for all H1-H6. Tracking tight (-0.02em).

body.usage: Use for all paragraphs and UI text. Excellent legibility at small sizes.

mono.usage: Use for data values, pricing, and technical details.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. THEME ENFORCEMENT: Always apply the 'dark' class to the root HTML element. The app is dark-mode only.
2. GLASSMORPHISM: Use the 'glass' gradient and backdrop-blur heavily in the Marketing sections (Hero, Navbar).
3. NEUMORPHISM: Use subtle borders and shadows in the Dashboard to separate data without clutter.
4. MOBILE FIRST: Design the bottom navigation bar for mobile users. It should be the primary nav on small screens.
5. NOISE TEXTURE: Apply the noise texture overlay to the body background to kill the flat digital look.
6. DATA-TESTID: Every interactive element (Button, Input, Link) MUST have a data-testid attribute (e.g., 'login-btn', 'service-card-1').
7. IMAGES: Use the provided Unsplash URLs. Do not use placeholders unless absolutely necessary.
8. SHADCN: Customize all Shadcn components to match the 'Nocturnal Utility' theme (Dark Slate bg, Violet borders).
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§  etc for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations.
